name: Defrag Deactivation
description: Detects the deactivation and disabling of the Scheduled defragmentation task as seen by Slingshot APT group
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.executable:*\\schtasks.exe AND process.command_line:(*\/delete* OR *\/change*) AND process.command_line:*\/TN* AND process.command_line:*\\Microsoft\\Windows\\Defrag\\ScheduledDefrag*)`
